title: 20 in. Poly Combo Snow Shovel
description: The True Temper 20 in. poly combo snow shovel is great for tackling light snow falls and blizzard conditions. The blade shape features a flat front end for pushing snow and slush while the deep back end is shaped to scoop snow. This shovel also features the patented Versa Grip which accommodates multiple gloved hand positions whether youre pushing or scooping snow.
